fixes.name: Sum Type
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR cumulative = SELECTEDVALUE('Cummulative Total'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    cumulative = "Total",
    SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales]),
    CALCULATE(
        SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales]),
        FILTER(ALLSELECTED('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'), TRUE())
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped the parameter reference to SELECTEDVALUE('Cummulative Total'[Display As]) and converted SUM([Sales]) to SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales]). The RUNNING_SUM(SUM([Sales])) branch is represented using CALCULATE + FILTER(ALLSELECTED(...)) to reflect a cumulative/window-style aggregation; a proper running total requires a sort/order field in the visual (not provided), so the ALLSELECTED placeholder preserves the selection context but will need an ordering column to produce a true running total.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter ([Parameters].[Cummulative Total]), and all parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
